title: Generate a Certificate of Analysis (CoA)
description: A batch of product has passed final testing and needs a Certificate of Analysis (CoA) to be sent with the shipment.

tasks.description: Identify the specific production batch that requires a CoA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects the correct batch number.

tasks.description: Retrieve all the final quality test results associated with that batch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the test results from the LIMS (Laboratory Information Management System).

tasks.description: Generate the CoA document, populating it with the test results, specifications, and a statement of conformity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates the CoA PDF, ready to be sent to the customer.
